H0.text: who has been designed as the new finance secretary of india. Arvind Subramanian

H1.text: who has been designed as the new finance secretary of india. Shaktikanta Das

H2.text: who has been designed as the new finance secretary of india. Rajiv Kumar

H3.text: who has been designed as the new finance secretary of india. Hasmukh Adhia

A4.text: He held the post of finance secretary between September 2017 and February 2020.

A5.text: Under the leadership of Kumar, the Election Commission conducted the election of the 18th Lok Sabha.

A6.text: Shaktikanta Das (born 26 February 1957) is an Indian bureaucrat and retired Indian Administrative Service officer who is currently serving as the 14th Principal Secretary to the Prime Minister of India.

A7.text: Arvind Subramanian is an Indian  economist and the former Chief Economic Advisor to the Government of India, having served from 16 October 2014 to 20 June 2018.

A8.text: Adhia was designated as the Finance Secretary in September 2017.

A9.text: Adhia retired from IAS and simultaneously demitted the offices of Finance Secretary and Revenue Secretary on 30 November 2018.
